title: MoveUp! Sitting Alert for Wear
summary: MoveUp! Sitting Alert for Android Wear - Smart Antidote for Sedentary Lifestyle!
description: MoveUp! Sitting Alert for Android WearSmart Antidote for Sedentary LifestyleThe must have app for your health, especially if you run a sedentary work or lifestyle!This app notifies you about the lack of activity for a specified period of time (30 minutes by default) and motivates you to be more active. Make no excuses: thanks to GuruWear formula support, you can now tie alert with your favourite workout routine!Several modes of operation:- Simple notification- Motivational quotes with animated timeless backgrounds (default)- Your custom textFully configurable (premium).Individual vibration pattern - easily recognize alert without glancing at your wrist.The application works directly on the watch even when disconnected from the phone.Efficiently utilizes built-in pedometer data, which makes it gentle on the battery life.Just install, activate and become more active!
descriptionHTML:
MoveUp! Sitting Alert for Android Wear
Smart Antidote for Sedentary Lifestyle

The must have app for your health, especially if you run a sedentary work or lifestyle!

This app notifies you about the lack of activity for a specified period of time (30 minutes by default) and motivates you to be more active.

Make no excuses: thanks to GuruWear formula support, you can now tie alert with your favourite workout routine!

Several modes of operation:
- Simple notification
- Motivational quotes with animated timeless backgrounds (default)
- Your custom text

Fully configurable (premium).

Individual vibration pattern - easily recognize alert without glancing at your wrist.

The application works directly on the watch even when disconnected from the phone.
Efficiently utilizes built-in pedometer data, which makes it gentle on the battery life.


Just install, activate and become more active!
comments: It doesnt work It doesnt work with my LG urbane. Dont waste your time. Their website Moveup.zone have virus dangerous site warning  mcafee. Stay away from this apps.
It's ok. Paid for premium, but can't make custom inactive time. After selecting time, there's only a cancel button and no submit or accept button. Whoops.
It doesnt work with fossil q wander
It didn't work as intended with my Huawei smart watch, but they provided a prompt refund for premium.

Never starts on its own I setup the app for 11a-8p, but it never starts up on its own. I have to start the app manually every day. Wasn't the automatic startup the premium feature that I paid for? (Gear Live smartwatch and Galaxy S5 phone)
recentChanges: - please install phone app for configuration (currently needed)
